## ISMI beamline upgrade

Proposed upgrade includes:

* new FTIR (Fourier Transform Infra-Red) spectrometer and microscope with FPA (Focal Plane Array) detector 
* near-field system for nano-scale IR spectroscopy, imaging and s-SNOM (scattering Scanning Near-field Optical Microscope)
